removePage

public void removePage(int pageNum)
                throws DataLinkException
Deletes the specified page. All subsequent page numbers will be decremented by one.

Parameters:
pageNum - The page number to remove.
Throws:
DataLinkException - If an error occurs or if the specified page does not exist.

Inserts a page at the specified position. All pages with a page number equal or greater will be incremented by one.

Parameters:

java.io.IOException

movePage

public void movePage(int from,
                     int to)
              throws DataLinkException
Moves a page to any position from a specified position. All pages between from and to will be incremented or decremented depending on whether from is greater than to or not.

Parameters:
from - The page to move.
to - Where to move the page.
Throws:
DataLinkException

search

public static ResultBuffer<Book> search(ManuscriptLink link,
                                        java.util.List<Pair<MetaDataKey,java.lang.String>> criteria,
                                        boolean disjoint,
                                        double relevance)
                                 throws DataLinkException
Search a ManuscriptLink for books matching textual criteria.

Parameters:
link - The link to search.
criteria - A list of criteria. Each pair indicates a MetaDataKey and a search term.
disjoint - If set to true, at least one criterion must be met to create a match. Otherwise, all criteria must be met.
relevance - Relevance threshold, between 0 to 1.
Returns:
A buffer containing search matches.
Throws:
DataLinkException
